SELECT 
    DATE(data_venda_date) as data,
    COUNT(*) as total_vendas,
    SUM(receita_total) as receita_total,
    AVG(receita_total) as ticket_medio
FROM silver.silver_vendas_enriquecidas
WHERE data_venda_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
GROUP BY DATE(data_venda_date)
ORDER BY data DESC;
